plot: Sneaky Snake (a green sock-puppet) plays an International spy determined to save the Prime Minister of Greece in this Bond-like adventure, filmed entirely on the Greek isle of Mykonos.
title: My Big Fat Greek Snake
plot_es: Sneaky Snake (a green sock-puppet) plays an International spy determined to save the Prime Minister of Greece in this Bond-like adventure, filmed entirely on the Greek isle of Mykonos.
plot_en: Sneaky Snake (a green sock-puppet) plays an International spy determined to save the Prime Minister of Greece in this Bond-like adventure, filmed entirely on the Greek isle of Mykonos.
